Object.Field: IGNORE_ERROR:UPDATE SNP_MODEL SET I_TRT_KCM = NULL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT I_TRT_KCM FROM SNP_TRT WHERE SNP_MODEL.I_TRT_KCM = SNP_TRT.I_TRT)
IGNORE_ERROR:UPDATE SNP_MODEL SET I_TRT_KDM = NULL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT I_TRT_KDM FROM SNP_TRT WHERE SNP_MODEL.I_TRT_KDM = SNP_TRT.I_TRT)
IGNORE_ERROR:UPDATE SNP_MODEL SET I_TRT_KJM = NULL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT I_TRT_KJM FROM SNP_TRT WHERE SNP_MODEL.I_TRT_KJM = SNP_TRT.I_TRT)
IGNORE_ERROR:UPDATE SNP_STEP SET I_TABLE = NULL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT I_TABLE FROM SNP_TABLE WHERE SNP_STEP.I_TABLE = SNP_TABLE.I_TABLE)

CREATE TABLE SNP_GRP_STATE ( FIRST_DATE <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_DATE")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, FIRST_USER <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "35")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, GRP_ORDER_DISP <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC", "2")?> NOT NULL, GRP_STATE_CODE <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "35")?> NOT NULL, GRP_STATE_NAME <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "35")?> NOT NULL, I_GRP_STATE <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC", "10")?> NOT NULL, IND_AUTO_INCREMENT <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "1")?> NOT NULL, IND_CHANGE <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "1")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, IND_INTERNAL <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "1")?> NOT NULL, IND_MULTI_STATES <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "1")?> NOT NULL, INT_VERSION <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC", "10")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, I_PROJECT <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC", "10")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, LAST_DATE <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_DATE")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, LAST_USER <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "35")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, TREE_DISPLAY <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "1")?> NOT NULL , CONSTRAINT PK_SNP_GRP_STATE PRIMARY KEY (I_GRP_STATE) )

CREATE TABLE SNP_INDIRECT_MREF ( ID_OBJECT_FK <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC", "10")?> NOT NULL, ID_OBJECT_PK <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC", "10")?> NOT NULL, I_INSTANCE <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC", "10")?> NOT NULL, IND_DIRECT <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC", "10")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, I_OBJECTS <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC", "10")?> NOT NULL, REF_KEY_NAME <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "100")?> NOT NULL , CONSTRAINT PK_SNP_IND_MREF PRIMARY KEY (I_INSTANCE,I_OBJECTS,ID_OBJECT_PK,ID_OBJECT_FK,REF_KEY_NAME) )

ALTER TABLE SNP_LINK_COORD ADD CONSTRAINT FK_SNP_COORD_LINK FOREIGN KEY (I_LINK) REFERENCES SNP_LINK_DIAG (I_LINK)

ALTER TABLE SNP_LINK_DIAG ADD CONSTRAINT FK_LINK_SNP_OBJ_TO FOREIGN KEY (I_DIAGRAM_FROM,I_OBJECTS_FROM,I_INSTANCE_FROM,SYN_NUMB_FROM) REFERENCES SNP_OBJ_DIAG (I_DIAGRAM,I_OBJECTS,I_INSTANCE,SYN_NUMB)

ALTER TABLE SNP_MISSING_REF ADD CONSTRAINT FK_MREF_ID_PK FOREIGN KEY (ID_OBJECT_PK) REFERENCES SNP_OBJECT_ID (I_OBJECT_ID)

ALTER TABLE SNP_OBJECT_ID_COL ADD CONSTRAINT FK_OID_COL_OID FOREIGN KEY (I_OBJECT_ID) REFERENCES SNP_OBJECT_ID (I_OBJECT_ID)

ALTER TABLE SNP_STATE2 ADD CONSTRAINT FK_STT_SNP_GRP_STT FOREIGN KEY (I_GRP_STATE) REFERENCES SNP_GRP_STATE (I_GRP_STATE)
ALTER TABLE SNP_TXT_CROSSR ADD CONSTRAINT FK_TXT_CROSSR_UFUN FOREIGN KEY (I_UFUNC) REFERENCES SNP_UFUNC (I_UFUNC)
ALTER TABLE SNP_UFUNC_TECHNO ADD CONSTRAINT FK_UFUNC_TECHNO FOREIGN KEY (I_UFUNC_IMPL) REFERENCES SNP_UFUNC_IMPL (I_UFUNC_IMPL)

<?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC", "10")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, I_FOLDER <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC", "10")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, DISTINCT_ROWS <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "1")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, ERR_ISO_REP <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "1")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, ERR_MARK <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "1")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, ERR_REC <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "1")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, MAX_ERR <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC", "10")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, MAX_ERR_PRCT <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "1")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, COMMIT_WORK <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "1")?> NOT NULL, INT_VERSION <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC", "10")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, IND_CHANGE <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "1")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, FIRST_DATE <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_DATE")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, FIRST_USER <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "35")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, LAST_DATE <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_DATE")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, LAST_USER <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "35")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, MOD_CODE <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "35")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, EXT_VERSION <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "35")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?> , CONSTRAINT PK_POP PRIMARY KEY (I_POP) )
